explanation: [0-0] On a winding road, there are two cars stopped. One is blue and the other is black, with two people standing to the right of the black car. Lush green trees line both sides of the road. In the middle of the frame are white and yellow English words and numbers: "Truck Sumbar 32", with a red rectangle above the numbers.
[0-4] The blue car drifts forward. It first swings its body and drives forward from the left, then drifts to the right, and then veers to the left in the middle of the road.
